body: This’s fantasy and people can do anything and everything is possible. Yet they settle for projecting and not understanding what an Oxymoron means.

Instead we got more projection crap. It really ruins what Yuri and shoujo ai are supposed to be. Shit people will ironically make the girls bisexuals which’s an oxymoron to the highest degree and defeats the whole reason for Yuri.
I’m really disappointed it wasn’t the mermaid to give loving to the werewolf and just be the extremely rare, but great Yuri-futanari.
We need more Elon Musk Doujins
@oskarmoped ehhh? this ones really nice though ~
It is rare, but there are cases were mizuga produces rather shitty doujins
